Such tales are more often fabrications than not, as few have actually encountered these creatures.

entries.name: Devourer from the Deeps
entries: Wakewyrms are more than a 100 feet long and weigh over 1000 tons. Their lashing tails, snapping jaws, and huge bodies can deal significant damage to a ship's hull, though they prefer to swallow sailors whole, swiftly pulling them into the fathoms below with hardly more than a splash. Filling their gullet with as many creatures as possible, wakewyrms let their strong stomachs take care of their meals. While a fine tactic for devouring fish or other large marine creatures, wakewyrms that swallow adventurers whole sometimes find the snack too much to handle.

Though wakewyrms rarely encounter sailing vessels as they cross the ocean looking for food, the results are often violent. Afterwards, all that remains is nothing but a derelict phantom ship, found wrecked against the rocks of distant shores.

monster.name: Ardwyn, Elder of Meadowfen
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Ardwyn can spend a reaction to fly up to her speed in one direction as she descends. She lands in an unoccupied space at the end of her movement, and takes no falling damage. She cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though she can drop any held items as part of her reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Ardwyn can use her powerful feathered arms to propel herself upward a distance equal to half her movement speed. She can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Seedspeech
entries: Ardwyn can communicate simple ideas to living plants, and is able to interpret their responses in simple language.

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, Ardwyn can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Ardwyn expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ardwyn is a 5th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Ardwyn has the following cleric spells prepared:

entries: Почтенный гуден галлус с округлыми пропорциями, похожий на рябчика, и перьями, давно утратившими блеск молодости. Как старейшина деревни, Ардвин является авторитетной фигурой в Мидоуфене. Она и ее покойный муж поддерживали жизнь деревни до его смерти, после чего она взяла эту роль на себя. Старейшина Ардвин - добрая и проницательная женщина, излучающая лидерство. Жители деревни надеются на ее руководство. Ардвин использует блок статики {@creature priest}, скорректированный с учетом расовых признаков гудена галлуса. Она нейтрально добрая.

monster.name: Birdfolk Dockmaster
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the dockmaster can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Confidence
entries: The dockmaster adds their Charisma modifier to their initiative rolls.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the dockmaster deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage when they hit a target with a weapon attack and they have advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the dockmaster that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the dockmaster doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dockmaster makes two saber attacks and one dagger attack.

action.name: Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

Может быть, странно видеть птицелюдей, работающих в доках и на кораблях порта Салтара, но для некоторых море - это образ жизни. Работа в мореходстве столь же прибыльна, сколь и тяжела. Для птицеловов, которые предпочитают заниматься своим ремеслом на воде, жизнь - это порядок и эффективность. Одна неправильно уложенная бочка или плохо закрепленный линь могут привести к катастрофе на море. Докмастеры очень серьезно относятся к своей морской работе.

monster.name: Birdfolk Farmer
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the farmer can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

action.name: Pitchfork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

Simple farmers can be found across the Wood, providing necessary food and supplies to the cities. There are many places in Humblewood where digging up large heaps of soil would either be impractical or damaging to the forest. While traditional farms exists in Humblewood, the majority of farms are built in the canopies in or around cities. Farming in the canopy consists of growing flowering
moss gardens or fruit-bearing vines on the branches of perch trees. Canopy farms can also include the raising of large insects for food, or silkworms for clothing.

monster.name: Birdfolk Guard
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the guard can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects or heavy weapons, (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

Aspiring recruits from all over the Wood flock to the Perch Guard headquarters in the capital of Alderheart to join their ranks. After successful training, these newly sworn guards return to their home perch. They serve with pride, acting as the perch's first line of defense. Under the Humblefolk Treaty, members of the Perch Guard are tasked to aid nearby villages on the forest floor whenever necessary. In larger cities like Alderheart, the Perch Guard are also responsible for dealing with inner city issues such as robbery, bar fights, and investi-gating and arresting criminals.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.name: Birdfolk Militia
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the militia can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as
part of their reaction).

В небольших населенных пунктах, где силы охраны могут быть минимальными или вообще отсутствовать, безопасность города обеспечивается местным ополчением. В эти отряды может записаться любой желающий, если он является добропорядочным гражданином. Они могут быть призваны стражей Окуня для выполнения различных обязанностей - от охраны порядка на улицах до поддержки военных действий.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Cara Stormsinger
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Cara Stormsinger can spend a reaction to fly up to her speed in one direction as she descends. She lands in an unoccupied space at the end of her movement, and takes no falling damage. She cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though she can drop any held items as part of her reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Cara Stormsinger has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface her talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Patterned Feathers
entries: Cara Stormsinger has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks when she attempts to hide in a forest.

A tawny-feathered swift strig woman from Meadowfen, Cara is the captain of the village militia. She was responsible for assembling the team of villagers who went out to investigate the black plume of smoke that appeared over Meadowfen's horizon. She endured a harrowing journey to return home and relay Ashbarrow's fate to Elder Ardwynn. Cara uses the birdfolk militia stat block adjusted with the racial traits of a swift strig. She is lawful good.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Birdfolk Sailor
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the sailor can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

Для птицеловов, которые занимаются мореплаванием, их дом находится как в океане, так и в порту. Они наслаждаются солеными брызгами и жестким ветром, считая замкнутое пространство лесной жизни удушающим по сравнению с широкими морскими просторами.

entries.name: Peculiar Design
entries: Конструкция кораблей Birdfolk часто вызывает недоумение среди других морских рас из-за относительного отсутствия такелажа. Веревки нужны для того, чтобы держать паруса на месте и хранить груз, но сети и альпинистские веревки оказываются менее необходимыми, когда экипаж способен к ограниченному полету. Птицелов-моряк может просто привязать веревку к ноге, распахнуть крылья и позволить океанскому бризу поднять его к парусам или на наблюдательный пост на грот-мачте.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Birdfolk Skirmisher
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the skirmisher can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Drop Attack
entries: The skirmisher can make an attack during their glide. If they do so they deal an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) points of damage.

Основную часть вооруженных сил Гвардии Перча составляет легкая пехота под названием "Копья". Они неустанно тренируются в обращении с шестопером, прекрасно подходящим для боя между ветвями. Многие из них также умеют атаковать на расстоянии с помощью этого оружия, а также выполнять специальные маневры пикирования, что делает их еще большей угрозой для врагов внизу. В мирное время скирмишеры часто выступают в роли искусных охотников, следуя указаниям следопытов, чтобы собрать достаточно пищи для целых деревень.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.name: Bita, the Council Speaker
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Bita can spend a reaction to fly up to her speed in one direction as she descends. She lands in an unoccupied space at the end of her movement, and takes no falling damage. She cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though she can drop any held items as part of her reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Bita can use her powerful feathered arms to propel herself upward a distance equal to half her movement speed. She can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Inspiring
entries: As an action, Bita inspires an ally that can see and hear her. The ally can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to their next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Bita adds 2 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Bita must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Bita is a bright gallus whose elegant white plumage resembles that of a peacock. As the Birdfolk Council's Speaker, she is always first to address those who have been granted an audience with the Council. She takes her duties as the Speaker and as a Council member very seriously. Despite her profound affection for Humblewood and its citizens, she often comes off as severe and cold. Bita believes in doing what's best for the folks of the Wood, and sometimes this means making level-headed, tough decisions. Bita uses the {@creature noble} stat block, adjusted with the racial traits of a bright gallus. She is lawful good.

trait.name: Surge of Vigor (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: If an attack deals over half of the general's current remaining hit points in damage (even if their hit points are reduced to 0 by the attack), they immediately regain 8 ({@dice 1d12 + 2}) hit points.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The general's long jump is 30 feet, and their base high jump is 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The general makes three melee attacks, two with their scimitar and one with their dagger. Alternatively, the general can make two ranged attack with their daggers.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The general adds 2 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them. The general must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Бандитскими кланами командуют генералы. Выступая в роли проверенного в боях воина и стратега, они в одиночку координируют разрозненные группы воров и преступников, составляющих коллектив. Хотя для обозначения бандитского руководства используются военные прозвища, для поддержания порядка в этих нестабильных организациях требуется нечто большее, чем боевая доблесть. Доминирующая личность и харизматичный голос так же необходимы, как стремительный клинок и острый ум. Серваны обычно не стремятся в разбойники, но их практические навыки и способность выживать даже в самых неблагоприятных ситуациях делают тех, у кого свободная мораль и сомнительные амбиции, естественной кандидатурой.

trait.name: Surge of Vigor (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: If an attack deals over half of Benna Seridan's current remaining hit points in damage (even if her hit points are reduced to 0 by the attack), she immediately regains 8 ({@dice 1d12 + 2}) hit points.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: Benna Seridan's long jump is 30 feet, and her base high jump is 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Benna Seridan makes three melee attacks, two with her scimitar and one with her dagger. Alternatively, Benna Seridan can make two ranged attack with her daggers.

action.name: Scimitar of the Wood
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage. The sword has 2 charges. Benna Seridan can expend a charge and speak the command word to cast {@spell spike growth} (save {@dc 16}) centered on herself. She can pass through this terrain unaffected. The sword regains one charge each day at dawn.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Benna Seridan adds 2 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. Benna Seridan must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Бенна - высокая, покрытая шрамами керванка из рощи, которая носит красную бандану над потерянным левым глазом. Лидер Коалиции бандитов, она идеалистка и считает, что навес Ольхона, символ власти птицелюдей в регионе, должен быть сожжен, а его ресурсы разграблены, чтобы помочь тем, кто был перемещен в результате пожара. Бенна жила спокойной деревенской жизнью, пока ее мать, уважаемая старейшина деревни и провидица, не предсказала, что придет пламя. В Совет Олдерхарта было послано сообщение с просьбой о помощи и снабжении, но в обоих случаях было отказано, поскольку Совет не верил в силу видений провидицы. Когда пламя уже почти поглотило деревню, на помощь пришли птицеловы, но было уже слишком поздно. Бенна потеряла свою семью. Она также потеряла левый глаз и левое ухо из-за ожогов, которые получила, помогая другим спастись от огня. Она попала к бандитам и быстро поднялась в их рядах благодаря своей страсти и целеустремленности. Она - опытный ветеран, который наращивает силы бандитов и использует организацию для ухода за смирителями, оставшимися без крова из-за распространяющихся пожаров. Бенна Серидан использует блок {@creature cervan bandit general|Humblewood}, но {@item scimitar|phb} в ее основной руке - это {@item blade of the wood|Humblewood} *(+1 к броскам атаки и урона, см. {@book Appendix D: New Magic Items|hwcs|8}), а {@item shortsword|phb} ({@damage 1d6 + 3} пронзающего урона) в ее свободной руке.

trait.name: Surge of Vigor (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: If the priest is dealt damage equal to half or more of their current remaining hit points (even if their HP is reduced to 0 by the attack), they immediately regain 8 ({@dice 1d12 + 2}) hit points.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the priest moves at least 20 feet in a straight line towards an enemy, their antler attack deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) points of piercing damage. If the target of the charge is Large or smaller, they must make a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from the priest.

action.name: Antlers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage if being held in both hands.

Деревнями серванов обычно руководит старейшина общины, мудрый как в политике, так и в путях Амарантина. Жрецы наставляют общину, следят за соблюдением ритуалов и обычаев. Как рассказчикам и хранителям истории деревни, им доверяют мифы и сказки, передающие знания, необходимые для выживания в лесу.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The priest is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

monster.name: Corvum Assassin
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the assassin can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The assassin has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During their first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the assassin deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when they hit a target with a weapon attack and have advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The assassin has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two melee attacks: one with their shortsword and one with their dagger. Or the assassin makes two ranged attacks with their daggers.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Заказных убийц, часто являющихся членами преступных организаций, можно встретить в самых крупных и политически сложных местах Вуда. Они обслуживают влиятельных лиц, не отличающихся щепетильностью и изобилием денег. Ассасинов обучают с раннего возраста, чтобы они стали смертоносными мастерами своего дела, учат, как скрытно передвигаться по ветвям и прятаться в пологом лесу, чтобы успеть устроить идеальную засаду. Корвумы, с их природным умом и хитростью, становятся лучшими убийцами.

monster.name: Corvum Diviner
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the diviner can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. The diviner lands in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and takes no falling damage. The diviner cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The diviner has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The diviner has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

Прорицатели специализируются на эзотерических заклинаниях и ритуалах, с помощью которых можно увидеть нити судьбы, движущие миром. Даже когда такие предсказания не сбываются, они обычно открывают полезную информацию. Корвумы ценят знания во всех их формах, часто торгуют секретами так же, как другие торгуют товарами, и поэтому многих привлекает искусство прорицателя.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The diviner is a 9th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The diviner has the following spells prepared:

monster.name: Corvax Revayne
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Corvax Revayne can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. Corvax lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. Corvax cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Corvax Revayne has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: Corvax Revayne has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Corvax Revayne is a 9th level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Corvax has the following spells prepared:

entries: Оперение этого стройного сумеречного корвума напоминает оперение черноклювой сороки. Профессор прорицания в Авиуме, его блестящий ум часто сдерживается паранойей - досадным побочным эффектом работы прорицателя. Это заставляет преподавателей относиться к его предсказаниям с осторожностью и снискало ему репутацию немного странной птицы в университетском городке. Однако он умен и способен, и может стать полезным союзником в последних двух частях приключения. Корвакс никогда не должен участвовать в бою.

monster.name: Corvum Necromancer
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the necromancer can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The necromancer has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Convincing
entries: The necromancer has advantage on all Charisma checks used to convince someone of their knowledge of subject matter pertaining to the Arcana skill.

trait.name: Life Leech
entries: Once per turn, when the necromancer kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, they can regain hit points equal to twice the level of the spell, or three times the level if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with both hands.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necromancer is a 9th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

entries: Каждое разумное существо подвержено соблазну некромантии. Перед обещанием вновь увидеть потерянных близких или собрать армию могущественных приспешников иногда бывает трудно устоять. Птицелюди Хамблвуда не застрахованы от этого соблазна. Чтобы помочь обуздать это любопытство, профессора в Авиуме преподают только теорию некромантии. Но некоторые бесстрашные студенты тайно занимаются практическим применением. Уверенные в своем интеллекте, корвумы, в частности, часто готовы бросить вызов традициям ради знаний. В результате не один корвум вступил на путь темных искусств.

monster.name: Odwald Ebonheart
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Odwald can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. Odwald lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. Odwald cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Odwald has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Convincing
entries: Odwald has advantage on all Charisma checks used to convince someone of his knowledge of subject matter pertaining to the Arcana skill.

trait.name: Life Leech
entries: Once per turn, when Odwald kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he can regain hit points equal to twice the level of the spell, or three times the level if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with both hands.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Odwald is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Odwald has the following wizard spells prepared:

entries: Одвальд - старый изможденный корвум, похожий на толстоклювого ворона с грубыми, инеистыми перьями, взъерошенными за годы приключений. У Одвальда острый ум, но слабое сердце. Член прославленного рода Эбонхартов, благородного дома, восходящего к основанию Альдерхарта, Одвальд был вундеркиндом, выросшим в мире, который ожидал от него блестящих способностей. Хотя магия всегда давалась ему естественно, давление ожиданий его семьи тяготило его и вселяло в него глубоко укоренившийся страх неудачи. Несколько месяцев назад неизвестное существо обманом заставило его ослабить печать, удерживающую аспект огня под Выжженной рощей. С тех пор он винит себя в ухудшении условий в Роще. У него нет решения, как остановить аспект, и это пугает его. Вскоре после спасения своего друга Риффина отчаяние заставило его вернуться в свою альма-матер, Авиум, где он с тех пор тайно работает с запретными магиями. Используя потайную дверь, которую он обнаружил во время своего студенчества, Одвальд превратил несколько недоступных и заброшенных аудиторий в импровизированную лабораторию, где он неустанно трудится, экспериментируя с темными и опасными магиями в надежде найти способ остановить Аспект. Одвальд использует блок статов {@creature corvum necromancer|Humblewood}. Его выравнивание - хаотично-нейтральное.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

Элиза Пенниглэм - элуран, группа кошкоподобных людей с запада. Хотя элураны не являются коренными жителями Хамблвуда, их часто можно увидеть на дорогах в составе торговых караванов и за торговыми лавками в столице. Элиза - смекалистый торговец, она едет в Алдерхарт, чтобы принять магазин своей покойной сестры. Она - прирожденный торгаш, но также милосердна к тем, кто столкнулся с трудностями. Элиза использует блок статов {@creature commoner}. Она нейтрально хороша.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: A jerbeen's long jump is 30 feet, and their base high jump is 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Team Tactics
entries: Jerbeens can take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

Стройный, светловолосый джербин с приветливым характером и печальной репутацией. Фигори уже два года учится в Авиуме, но беспокойство по поводу ожиданий профессоров и сложного расписания, необходимого для того, чтобы бесперые студенты могли ориентироваться в кампусе, задержало его на целый год по сравнению с другими студентами. В "Авиуме" над ним издеваются одноклассники, а недавняя встреча с булыжником заставила его сильно испугаться. Он отчаянно хочет, чтобы кто-нибудь поверил в его историю и принял меры против существа, скрывающегося в кампусе. Фигори использует блок статистики {@creature commoner}, скорректированный с учетом расовых признаков джербина. Он нейтрален.

monster.name: Gallus Druid
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the druid can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the druid can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The druid can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Seedspeech
entries: The druid can communicate simple ideas to living plants, and is able to interpret their responses in simple language.

trait.name: Spirit Totem (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the druid calls forth a nature spirit. The spirit appears at a point the druid can see within 60 feet. The spirit creates a 30-foot-radius aura. The spirit is neither an object nor a creature, but is a spectral beast. As a bonus action, the druid can move the spirit to another location within 60 feet. The spirit lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: Bear Spirit
entries: The druid and allies within the aura gain 9 temporary hit points and have advantage on Strength checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Hawk Spirit
entries: The druid can use their reaction to grant advantage to an ally's attack roll against a target in the aura. The druid and allies within the aura have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks.

entries.name: Unicorn Spirit
entries: If a spell that requires a spell slot heals the druid or allies in the aura, each creature of the druid's choice also gains 4 hit points

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The druid is a 6th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The druid has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

У галлусов из Хамблвуда особенно глубокая связь с природой. Ханера учит их смотреть на мир с лесной подстилки, а не с высоты. Это наставление многие галлу приняли близко к сердцу. Из этого благоговения перед природой некоторые галлу посвящают себя изучению и сохранению Леса, становясь надзирателями леса или выступая в роли проводников. Избранные, обладающие уникальной связью с флорой и фауной, развивают невероятные силы и способности. Такие друиды могут проращивать деревья и лечить раненых животных одним прикосновением. Их почитают и среди птицеловов, и среди смиренных людей как духовных лидеров и мудрых советников.

monster.name: Gallus Monk
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the monk can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the monk can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The monk can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Wind's Grace
entries: While moving, the monk can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling.

Галлусы, которых не устраивает повседневная жизнь в небольших общинах, отправляются в уединенные монастыри и постигают монашеский путь. Там за дисциплинированным распорядком физических нагрузок и духовного созерцания следят мудрые мастера. После нескольких лет обучения посвященные считаются готовыми отправиться в путешествие по земле и проверить свои знания на практике. Большинство возвращается в монастырь, получив откровение во время путешествия. Другие продолжают странствовать, иногда с несколькими верными спутниками, вечно находя новый смысл жизни.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monk makes four attacks, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack. They can also use their Graceful Step once, either before or after one of the attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Attack
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Graceful Step
entries: The monk moves 40 feet. This movement does not provoke {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Inspiring
entries: The monk inspires an ally that can see and hear them. The ally can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to their next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

monster.name: Gallus Necromancer
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the necromancer can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. The necromancer lands in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and takes no falling damage. The necromancer cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the necromancer can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The necromancer can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Seedspeech
entries: The necromancer can communicate simple ideas to living plants, and is able to interpret their responses in simple language.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necromancer is a 9th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

Галлусов обычно не привлекает путь некромантии, но несколько чудаков с талантом и склонностью к изучению темной стороны магии нашли успех в Авиуме. Чаще всего такие некроманты изучают это искусство теоретически, изучая, как оно нарушает баланс жизни и смерти, чтобы их ученики могли научиться эффективно противостоять таким мерзким заклинаниям.

monster.name: Glinda Nightseed
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Glinda can spend a reaction to fly up to her speed in one direction as she descends. Glinda lands in an unoccupied space at the end of her movement, and takes no falling damage. Glinda cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though she can drop any held items as part of her reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Glinda can use her powerful feathered arms to propel herself upward up to half her movement speed. Glinda can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Seedspeech
entries: Glinda can communicate simple ideas to living plants, and is able to interpret their responses in simple language.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Glinda is a 9th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Glinda has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

This huden gallus' plumage resembles a ptarmigan, and she usually wears a pince-nez on her beak. A professor of advanced theoretical necromancy, Glinda is known for having strange opinions about her field of study. Unlike most birdfolk, she sees necromancy as a manipulation of life energies on par with druidic magic. She is a kind soul, and only practices the lighter forms of necromancy. However, she has been performing secret experiments on the servitor skeletons in the Avium, hoping to develop a cutting-edge resurrection spell. This violates campus policies, which ban practical necromancy, and could cause her to lose her job. Glinda uses the gallus necromancer stat block. Her alignment is chaotic good.

monster.name: Gregor Thornspur, Magistrate of Alderheart
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Gregor can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. He lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. He cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Gregor can use his powerful feathered arms to propel himself upward a distance equal to half his movement speed. He can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Gregor can choose to reroll any attack roll, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Damage Resistance
entries: Gregor is resistant to poison damage.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: Gregor has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Gregor adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Gregor must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Грегор - унылый соболиный лума с одним перышком, странно торчащим над бровью. Грегор - магистрат Ольхона, и хотя он выглядит усталым бюрократом, за его манерой поведения скрывается проницательный бизнесмен, стремящийся обратить любую ситуацию себе на пользу. Он не гнушается брать взятки в обмен на ускорение рассмотрения просьб в Совете птицеловов. Грегор использует блок характеристик {@creature noble}, скорректированный с учетом расовых признаков соболиного лума. Он хаотически нейтрален.

monster.name: Hedge Bard
languages: can also speak with beasts of any size which represent spiders, insects, worms, or other bugs

trait.name: Taunt (2/Day)
entries: The bard can use a bonus action on their turn to target one creature within 30 feet of them. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bard is a 4th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following bard spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: he bard makes two weapon attacks, one with their rapier and one with their dagger.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Curl Up
entries: The bard curls up into a spiny ball. While curled up in this way they cannot move, attack, or cast spells with somatic components, and their base armor class becomes 19. Any creature that misses the hedge bard with a melee attack while they are curled up takes {@dice 2d4} points of piercing damage from their sharp quills. If a creature hits the bard while they are curled up, however, the bard is knocked {@condition prone} in their space at the end of the turn. The bard may uncurl themselves at any point during their turn.

Признанные отличными дипломатами и посредниками, хеджи менее известны своей любовью к музыке. Те, кто обращает свое природное обаяние на талант развлекать, могут добиться большого успеха. Некоторые из наиболее одаренных исполнителей наделены магическими талантами. Хотя большинство хеджей используют эти способности во благо, другие выбирают более зловещий путь, используя свои бардовские таланты для обмана, обмана или кражи у простых людей.

monster.name: Hedge Witch
languages: can also speak with beasts of any size which represent spiders insects worms or other bugs

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The witch is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The witch has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fiendish Vigor
entries: The witch can cast {@spell false life} at will as a 1st-level spell.

action.name: Curl Up
entries: The witch curls up into a spiny ball. While curled up in this way they cannot move, attack, or cast spells with somatic components, and their base armor class becomes 19. Any creature that misses the witch with a melee attack while they are curled up takes {@dice 2d4} points of piercing damage from their sharp quills. If a creature hits the witch while they are curled up, however, the witch is knocked {@condition prone} in their space at the end of the turn. The witch may uncurl themselves at any point during their turn.

Многие из тех, кто подает заявление на обучение в Авиуме, получают отказ от престижного учебного заведения. Подстегиваемые стремлением к знаниям, отвергнутые кандидаты иногда вступают на путь самообучения, чтобы стать мастерами арканы. Заметно соприкасаясь с магией леса, хеджи, идущие по индивидуальному пути, часто используют свою связь с этими природными силами для заключения договоров с могущественными фейями или элементалями, узнавая секреты, недоступные традиционным студентам.

trait.name: Dark One's Blessing
entries: When the witch reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, the witch gains 5 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When the witch hits a creature with eldritch blast, they can push the creature up to 10 feet away in a straight line.

monster.name: Susan of the Swamp
languages: can also speak with beasts of any size which represent spiders, insects, worms, or other bugs

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Susan is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Susan has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fiendish Vigor
entries: Susan can cast {@spell false life} at will as a 1st-level spell.

action.name: Curl Up
entries: Susan curls up into a spiny ball. While curled up in this way she cannot move, attack, or cast spells with somatic components, and her base armor class becomes 19. Any creature that misses Susan with a melee attack while she is curled up takes {@dice 2d4} points of piercing damage from her sharp quills. If a creature hits Susan while she is curled up, however, Susan is knocked {@condition prone} in her space at the end of the turn. Susan may uncurl herself at any point during her turn.

Сьюзан - эксцентричная хеджистка, чьи магические способности всегда превосходили ее жажду знаний. Она недолго училась в Авиуме, но ушла по собственному желанию, чтобы поэкспериментировать с магией, которую Авиум счел неблагоприятной. Недавно Сьюзен поселилась на болоте в надежде спокойно заниматься своими арканными диковинками. Свой скромный дом она делит со своим знакомым жуком, Нормалом, и проводит время, добывая ингредиенты, проверяя заклинания и читая романы о тайнах, а также тома элдритхов. Хотя она проводит свои ритуалы на безопасном расстоянии от городов и поселков, ее присутствие в регионе вызывает беспокойство у магистрата Виннинг Рич, и он хочет, чтобы она ушла. Сьюзен использует блок статов {@creature hedge witch|Humblewood}. Ее выравнивание - хаотическое добро.

trait.name: Dark One's Blessing
entries: When Susan reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 5 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When Susan hits a creature with eldritch blast, she can push the creature up to 10 feet away in a straight line.

monster.name: Jell Platena
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Jell can choose to reroll any attack roll, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Songbird (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Jell can cast {@spell charm person}. Charisma is her spellcasting ability and the spell does not require any somatic components to cast.

Jell is a bespectacled sera luma with bright red plumage resembling a cardinal. Jell has studied at the Avium for three years now, and is well on her way to becoming a graduate. She is bright and studious, and serious about everything she does in life. Jell uses the commoner stat block, adjusted with the racial traits of a sera luma. She is neutral good.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The thief's long jump is up to 30 feet and their high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Team Tactics
entries: The thief can take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thief makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Opportunist
entries: When a creature fails a melee attack roll against the thief, the thief can make a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check against a DC equal to 10 + the target creature's Dexterity modifier. On a success, the thief steals one item of the GMs choosing from the target. It cannot be an item actively held or worn by the target.

Хотя преступников часто можно встретить в крупных городах, где обитают окуни, только самые успешные из них попадают в Коалицию бандитов. Невысокого роста, джербины могут легко передвигаться незаметно; их стремительность объясняет выражение "быстрый, как джербин". Это, в сочетании с их природным обаянием, делает джербинов идеально подходящими для воровского искусства.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The swashbuckler's base long jump is 30 feet, and their base high jump is 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Team Tactics
entries: The swashbuckler can take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sharp Witted Defense
entries: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, their AC includes their Charisma modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swashbuckler makes three attacks, one with a dagger and two with their rapier.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: The swashbuckler reduces the damage dealt by one melee attack that would hit them by 4 ({@dice 1d8}), and deals that much piercing damage to their attacker. The swashbuckler must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Частая фигура во многих джербенских сказках, меченосец - это чемпион, который сражается изощренно и смело. Прирожденные лидеры, фехтовальщики не теряют самообладания во время поединка, используя небольшие преимущества для победы. Джербинские фехтовальщики часто тренируются в традициях своего амарантинца Гаспарда. Каждый год фехтовальщики участвуют в фехтовальных поединках, проводимых в честь Гаспарда. Не все фехтовальщики идут по этому пути, некоторые используют свои таланты в разбойничьих делах.

monster.name: Kenna Brightspark
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Kenna can spend a reaction to fly up to her speed in one direction as she descends. Kenna lands in an unoccupied space at the end of her movement, and takes no falling damage. Kenna cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though she can drop any held items as part of her reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Kenna has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface her talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Learned
entries: Kenna gains proficiency in one of the following skills: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Religion}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: Kenna has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in dim light or darkness.

Энергичная и любопытная молодая исследовательница Сумеречного Корвума, которая в настоящее время работает над диссертацией в Winnowing Reach. Исследование Кенны посвящено свойствам различных слизей в регионе. Она является студенткой Авиума и надеется, что ее выводы позволят ей получить грант для дальнейшего изучения этих удивительных существ. Кенна - уроженка Уинновинг Рич и хорошо знает деревню. Она немного вспыльчива и идет на риск ради своей работы. Кенна использует блок статистики {@creature commoner}, скорректированный с учетом расовых признаков сумеречного корвума. Она хаотично добрая.

monster.name: Luma Cleric of Ardea
languages: can understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the cleric can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, or heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the cleric can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The cleric can use this in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The luma cleric can choose to reroll any attack roll, skill check, or saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cleric is a 5th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The cleric has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Ardea's Vigor (1/Day)
entries: The cleric calls on the powers of Ardea to imbue their allies with her protective life force. The luma cleric and up to 3 allies within 30 feet gain 5 ({@dice 2d4}) temporary hit points. For one minute, anyone under this effect gains 5 temporary hit points at the start of each of their turns.

action.name: Songbird (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The cleric can cast {@spell charm person}. Charisma is their spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}) and the spell does not require any somatic components to cast.

Клирики Ардеи путешествуют по Лесу, совершая священные паломничества к священным рощам, в которых кипит жизнь, взращенная Матерью Рассвета. Они распространяют послание доброты Ардеи повсюду, где бы они ни были, беря на себя защиту всего живого, великого и малого. Клирики служат общинам, через которые проходят, как целители, посредники, а иногда и как доблестные защитники. Лумы, внявшие призыву Амарантины, находят свою природную харизму и мистические таланты очень полезными на пути клирика.

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the wizard can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the wizard can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The wizard can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The wizard can choose to reroll any attack, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: The wizard has advantage on saving throws against poison.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wizard is a 10th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The wizard has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

Среди птичьего племени широко распространено мнение, что тонким искусством магии могут овладеть лишь те, кто обладает целенаправленным умом. По неизвестным причинам, возможно, из-за присущей им связи с судьбой или особой манеры общения с миром, люмы способны с легкостью приобщаться к мистическим и магическим силам.

reaction.name: Charming (3/Day)
entries: When a creature makes an attack against the wizard, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or target the next closest creature within range. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses. This feature does not work if there are no other creatures within range

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Gabe can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. He lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. He cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Gabe can use his powerful feathered arms to propel himself upward up to half his movement speed. Gabe can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Gabe can choose to reroll any attack, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: Gabe has advantage on saving throws against poison.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Gabe is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Gabe has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

Гейб - соболиный лума средних лет с большим плюмажем из переливчатых перьев, которые окружают его затылок, как капюшон. Декан Авиума, Гейб всегда выглядит так, словно он глубоко задумался. Хотя его дружелюбие и странное поведение заставляют людей недооценивать его, под причудливой внешностью скрывается острый ум, который тщательно оценивает все возможности, прежде чем начать действовать. Он добродушный ученый, который заботится о благополучии своих сотрудников и студентов не меньше, чем о качестве исследований и образования в Авиуме. Декан Виндсворт использует блок статов {@creature luma wizard|Humblewood}. Его выравнивание - нейтрально-хорошее.

reaction.name: Charming (3/Day)
entries: When a creature makes an attack against Gabe, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or target the next closest creature within range. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses. This feature does not work if there are no other creatures within range

trait.name: Resilience
entries: The bandit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The bandit has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks made in dim light or total darkness.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

Мапачи пользуются особым недоверием среди птицелюдей из-за своей эксцентричности и готовности нарушать общепринятые обычаи. Некоторые мапачи с трудом интегрируются в общество птицелюдей и, чтобы выжить, идут на преступление. Местные бандиты охотно пользуются этим, предлагая перемещенным мапачам кров и долю добычи в обмен на их службу.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: The brute has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The brute has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks made in dim light or total darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brute makes three melee attacks, two with their rapier and one with their parrying dagger.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Parrying Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

Хотя многие в коалиции бандитов следуют благородным идеалам, всегда была горстка ненадежных членов, озабоченных только собственным продвижением. Эти безжалостные грубияны - негодяи насквозь, готовые захватить власть в коалиции любыми средствами. Конечно, среди мапачей не так уж много бездельников, но дурная слава нескольких таких негодяев еще больше подмочила их репутацию в глазах обитателей насеста.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The brute adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit them. The brute must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: Krall has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: Krall has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks made in dim light or total darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Krall makes three melee attacks, two with his rapier and one with his parrying dagger.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Parrying Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

Кралл - внушительный мапач, ростом почти 6 футов, крепкого телосложения, с матовым мехом, который местами отсутствует. Он был близким другом Бенны, хотя и не разделял ее альтруизма и считал, что тех, кто не может нести свой груз, следует оставить. Он ожидает полной преданности от своих последователей и предпочитает тактику "бей и беги". Он и его войска взимают с плохо защищенных караванов пошлину за проезд по дорогам, которую многие платят, чтобы избежать его гнева. Кралл использует блок статов {@creature mapach brute|Humblewood}.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Krall adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. Krall must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: The tinkerer has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The tinkerer has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks made in dim light or total darkness.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tinker's Toys
entries: The tinkerer uses one of the following options (roll a {@dice d4} or choose one); the tinkerer can use each one no more than once per day:

entries.name: 1. Cogwork Bird
entries: The tinkerer winds and releases a small mechanical bird that flies to a target creature within 30 feet and distracts it. The next attack against that creature is made with advantage.

entries.name: 2. Flash-bangs
entries: The tinkerer targets a space up to 10 ft. away, and throws some small explosive shells that flare up in a blinding light. All creatures within 10 ft. of the target space must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the tinkerer's next turn.

entries.name: 3. Nettle Gun
entries: The tinkerer turns the crank on a small gadget that sprays nettles at a target. {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 10/20 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. All creatures within 5 ft. of the target must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

entries.name: 4. Grease Balloon
entries: The tinkerer targets a 10-foot by 10-foot area up to 15 feet away, and makes it slick with grease. The area is considered difficult terrain, and each creature standing in the area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

В отличие от тех, кто довольствуется рамками своего устоявшегося ремесла, мастеровые имеют страсть к инновациям, не ограниченным традициями. Мастера Mapach, которые постоянно ищут способы улучшить свои прошлые творения, называют себя эксцентриками. Их методы нетрадиционны, но очень практичны. Конструкции часто тщательно продумываются, и некоторые из их инноваций в конечном итоге находят широкое применение по всему миру.

monster.name: Mordane Swiftgale
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Patterned Feathers
entries: Mordane has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks when he attempts to hide in a forest.

trait.name: Talons
entries: Mordane has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

Мордейн - чопорный пожилой стремительный стриж, который следит за чистотой своих серо-белых перьев и свежевыглаженных одеяний библиотекаря. Он мудр, но старомоден, и предпочитает читать в одиночестве, когда нет смены, а не общаться со своими коллегами. Несмотря на свои социальные недостатки, он опытный библиотекарь и обладает невероятными знаниями даже самых старых частей нижней библиотеки. Мордейн использует блок статов {@creature commoner}, скорректированный с учетом расовых признаков быстрого стригоя. Он нейтрален.

trait.name: False Appearance (Treant)
entries: While Oakheart remains motionless, he appears as a great oak with charred bark that smolders in places and flames in place of leaves.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Oakheart deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Oakheart makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) fire damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries: Oakheart magically animates one or two trees he can see within 60 feet of him. These trees have the same statistics as Oakheart, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of Oakheart. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until Oakheart dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until Oakheart takes a bonus action to turn him back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

Дубовое сердце - огромное древовидное существо с обугленной корой, которая местами тлеет, и множеством маленьких языков пламени, которые горят на его ветвях, создавая впечатление листьев. Когда-то он был треантом и купался в первобытных энергиях Выжженной рощи, превратившись в существо, настолько полно владеющее стихией пламени, что способно служить {@item Borealus|Humblewood|The Borealus'} хранителем. Он является хранителем артефакта и не отдаст посох, пока не убедится, что тот, кто потревожил его, может контролировать значительную силу посоха, и что он намерен поддерживать природный баланс, ради защиты которого он пожертвовал собой.

monster.name: Raptor Explorer
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the explorer can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The explorer rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Patient
entries: When the explorer reacts with a readied action, they have advantage on the first attack roll, skill check, or ability check they make as a part of that action.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The explorer has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Sure Footing
entries: The explorer ignores non-magical difficult terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The explorer makes two melee attacks or two attacks with their hand crossbow.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

Влекомые рассказами о сокровищах или притягательностью далеких земель, некоторые жители Хамблвуда отправляются на поиски дальних руин или отдаленных просторов, чтобы удовлетворить свою жажду странствий. Среди хищников часто встречаются исследователи, многие из которых делают это из почтения к амарантинской Рейе, проводнику и защитнику путешественников. Многие исследователи пускаются в такие приключения ради самопознания и личностного роста. Те, кто зарабатывает себе на жизнь исследованиями, часто пользуются большим спросом в качестве проводников.

monster.name: Raptor Ranger
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the ranger can spend

a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The ranger rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Aerial Defense
entries: Creatures who attack the ranger while the ranger is falling, gliding, or jumping have disadvantage on their attack roll.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The explorer has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Arrow Sight (3/Day)
entries: When the ranger attacks with their red-feather bow, they can use their bonus action to see from the point the arrow struck as if they were there. If the arrow strikes a creature, the ranger can see from the creature's perspective. This effect lasts for 1 minute.

trait.name: Hunter (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the ranger can deal an extra {@dice 1d10} damage on their next attack made with a shortbow or longbow.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ranger makes two red-feather bow attacks.

action.name: Red-Feather Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

Рейнджер - культовая фигура в историях и мифах о хищниках, вдохновившая многих пойти по их легендарным стопам. Снаряженные для суровой жизни в дикой природе, эти рейнджеры - непревзойденные лучники и исключительные охотники. Обладая сверхъестественным зрением и быстрыми рефлексами, хищники идеально подходят для жизни охотника. Многие, выбравшие этот путь, становятся вдохновением для новых историй.
Перечисленные рейнджеры-хищники оснащены {@item red-feather bow|Humblewood} (см. {@book Appendix D: New Magic Items|hwcs|8}).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ranger is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is
Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, + 5 to hit with spell attacks). The ranger has the following spells prepared:

monster.name: Rhys Birchwalker
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Hunter's Training
entries: Rhys has proficiency with the {@item longbow|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item spear|phb}. Additionally, her familiarity with the longbow means that it is not considered a heavy weapon for her.

trait.name: Talons
entries: Rhys has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface her talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Aerial Defense
entries: Creatures who attack Rhys while she ranger is falling, gliding, or jumping have disadvantage on their attack roll.

Доцент кафедры колдовства в Авиуме, этот мистралийский хищник средних лет не обладает особым мистическим талантом, но компенсирует его энтузиазмом к обучению и обширными знаниями по выбранному предмету. Она хорошо разбирается в теории колдовства и может предоставить персонажам любую информацию, которую они могли бы найти в {@b Conjuration Magic} (см. {@adventure Into the Library|hwcs|4|Into the Library}), если ее спросить об этом напрямую. Профессор Бирчвалкер также может помочь персонажу произвести расчеты, чтобы найти местоположение круга колдовства в Роще. Рис использует блок статов {@creature commoner}, скорректированный с учетом расовых признаков мистрального хищника. Она нейтрально добрая.

monster.name: Strig Knight
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the knight can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The knight rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Maneuver (2/Day)
entries: When the knight hits with an attack, they can choose to maneuver the enemy out of position, granting an ally within 5 feet of the target the opportunity to use their reaction to move away from this enemy at half their movement speed without provoking an {@action opportunity attack|phb|attack of opportunity}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two short sword attacks.

action.name: Short Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. The knight can choose to grapple a target hit by this attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Wing Crest Shield (1/Day)
entries: The knight casts the {@spell gust of wind} spell (save {@dc 15}).

Гвардия Окуня производит много квалифицированных солдат, но только те, кто обладает большим талантом, обучаются, чтобы стать рыцарями. Рыцарей Оперной гвардии Олдерхарта учат защищать других, создавая союзникам возможности для перегруппировки или отступления в случае необходимости. Эксперты в сражении мечом и щитом, тяжеловооруженный стиль боя рыцарей позволяет им держать строй даже против самых яростных врагов. Рыцарь стригоя, указанный в списке, экипирован {@item wing crest shield|Humblewood} (см. {@book Appendix D: New Magic Items|hwcs|8}).

monster.name: Riffin, the Ash-Knight
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Riffin can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. He lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. He cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Riffin rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Maneuver (2/Day)
entries: When Riffin hits with an attack, he can choose to maneuver the enemy out of position, granting an ally within 5 feet of the target the opportunity to use their reaction to move away from this enemy at half their movement speed without provoking an {@action opportunity attack|phb|attack of opportunity}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Riffin makes two short sword attacks.

action.name: Short Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. The knight can choose to grapple a target hit by this attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Wing Crest Shield (1/Day)
